ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and so that Allah may help you with a mighty help.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And help you with surpassing help.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and that Allah may bestow upon you a mighty help.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and grant you a majestic triumph.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And so that Allah may provide you a great help.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And that Allah may help you with strong help.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And that Allah might help you with a mighty help.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and that God may help thee with mighty help.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And that Allah may help thee with strong help -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and so that God might bestow on you His mighty help.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And that Allah may succour thee with a mighty succour.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and Allah will help you with a mighty help.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And that Allah may help thee with powerful help.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And that Allah may help you with strong help.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and that Allah helps you with a mighty help.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And help you with an unwavering support.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [that] Allah may aid you with a mighty victory.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [48:3] and that God may grant you, therein, a mighty victory, one of glory, involving no humiliation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And that Allah may help you) against your enemy (with strong help) whereby you suffer no humiliation.
